definition: to mortgage/to pawn/to detain in custody/to escort and protect/(literary) to sign

sentences.english: The detention house is the main place for the implementation of pre-trial detention.
sentences.chinese: 看守所是我國審前羈押的主要執行場所。

sentences.english: Detaining suspects to prevent collusion or the destruction of evidence is also plagued with problems.
sentences.chinese: 串供或滅證羈押的制度也不大有問題。

sentences.english: Part III makes an investigation and evaluation on pre-sentence custody mechanism abroad.
sentences.chinese: 第三部分域外未決羈押機制的考察與評析。

sentences.english: Thirdly, to define the term of detaining after arrestment according to be law.
sentences.chinese: 第三，相應地明確規定逮捕後的羈押期限。

sentences.english: Extended custody is a difficult law-implementing problem which has worried us over a long period of time.
sentences.chinese: 超期羈押是一個長期困擾我們的執法難題。

sentences.english: Suspensive detention system is the importance part of the modern legal system.
sentences.chinese: 未決羈押制度是現代化法治建設的重要組成部分。

sentences.english: Yet the arrest of a Taiwanese general on charges of spying for China shows how hostilities still simmer.
sentences.chinese: 然而，臺方對“將軍共諜”羈押表明雙方敵意仍在。

sentences.english: Part II makes an investigation on China's status pre-sentence custody mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分我國未決羈押機制的現狀考察。

sentences.english: Detained persons may request such assistance in all of the island's subbureaus.
sentences.chinese: 被羈押人員在島內所有分局均可要求這種援助。

sentences.english: The first part tells about what'sthe precise meaning of the pretrial detaining.
sentences.chinese: 第一部分，審前羈押體制的限定及其研究意義。

sentences.english: III. Establishing a system of timely circulating notices and informing the court of the period of custody.
sentences.chinese: 建立及時通報制度，告知法院羈押期限。

sentences.english: The judicial organs have adopted vigorous measures to prevent and contain extended detention.
sentences.chinese: 司法機關採取有力措施預防和遏制超期羈押。

sentences.english: Fourthly, to establish the detention inspecting system after arrest.
sentences.chinese: 四是建立逮捕以後的羈押審查複覈制度。

sentences.english: The power of custody also shows its contradiction in its function of protecting human rights.
sentences.chinese: 羈押權在其人權保障功能上也體現出它的悖論性。

sentences.english: The Taipei court will decide this week whether Chen will be released or not.
sentences.chinese: 據悉，臺北地院本週將裁定是否繼續羈押陳水扁。

sentences.english: Unconvicted Detention has been an important system under the criminal procedural law over the world.
sentences.chinese: 未決羈押制度是各國刑事訴訟中的一項重要制度。

definition: on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
(of a bird, fish etc) to be caught in a net/(of a tennis ball) to hit the net/(of a criminal) to be captured
to re-investigate/to investigate and reconsider a judgment
to bring to justice/to hand over to the law
to execute by firing squad/same as 槍斃|枪毙
to raise a charge/to sue/to institute proceedings
